amendment.description: To require a report on plans to implement reductions to certain salaries and expenses accounts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 755 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 755 proposed by Senator Kohl to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6577-6582; text: CR S6578) To require a report on plans to implement reductions to certain salaries and expenses accounts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 755 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 755 proposed by Senator Kohl to Amendment SA 738.
